item.title: The 'End' Game: End-times & the End of Our Credibility
item.dc:creator: Jason West
item.description: Instead of wildly guessing about possible dates for the apocalypse, why not make it a point to declare in public only those things which we know are verifiable and well-attested in Scripture? Why not use the public square for more fruitful discussions and interactions that actually increase our trustworthiness as representatives of God rather than destroying it?
